title: Replace only the top-of-page hero logo with uploaded CCPG logo

requirements.text: Add the user-uploaded logo image ("CCPG logo.png") as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated, and update the top-of-page (hero) logo in frontend/src/components/landing/sections/HeroSection.tsx to use this new asset instead of the current /assets/generated/ccpg-logo-transparent.dim_512x128.png.

quotes: The main log at the very top of the page only

acceptanceCriteria: A new logo image derived from the uploaded "CCPG logo.png" exists under frontend/public/assets/generated with the filename specified in this build request.
HeroSection renders the new generated logo image at the very top of the page (the centered logo/wordmark block).
No other logos/images elsewhere in the app are changed as part of this update.
The hero logo remains responsive and visually aligned (keeps h-12 w-auto on mobile and sm:h-16 on larger screens or equivalent sizing behavior).

constraints: Frontend paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT must not be edited.
Replace only the main top-of-page (hero) logo; do not change any other logos or images elsewhere in the app.
nonGoals: Updating the hero background image or any carousel behavior.
Changing any marketing copy, colors/theme, or layout outside the top-of-page logo swap.

required: Square black-and-white brand logo on a white background (ccpg-logo-top.dim_512x512.png)
